message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $15,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position. Could we meet in the middle at $16,500?
I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $14,000?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we settle at $15,250? This is my final offer.
I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go down to $13,500?
